attributes.action: reject the 10-fold increase to £50 of Dog Licence fees in Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please  take a moment to sign this petition. The cost of a dog licence in Northern Ireland is set to increase 10-fold to £50. The new legislation will go out to public consultation next month. 
This is a ridiculous hike in the Licence Fee and is completely unrealistic. Responsible dog owners who do not allow their dogs to roam will be penalised. 
This is not the answer to controlling the stray dog issue in Northern Ireland. The answer is neutering and spaying to avoid further litters.
We urge the government to rethink this increase.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
